notes: regular -ire verb; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: I want to follow the course.

notes: past participle; also used as noun

example_sentence_italian: La pagina è stata seguita da molti.
example_sentence_english: The page was followed by many.

example_sentence_italian: I commenti sono seguiti dagli utenti.
example_sentence_english: The comments are followed by the users.

example_sentence_italian: Le discussioni sono seguite dal pubblico.
example_sentence_english: The discussions are followed by the public.

translation_english: he was following/she was following/you (formal) were following
he has followed/she has followed/you (formal) have followed
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
